Package com.group26.node.packet.formats

Class IssueAddressPacket

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.group26.node.packet.formats.IssueAddressPacket
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkPacket
    public class IssueAddressPacket
extends java.lang.Object
implements NetworkPacket
    Encapsulation of addressing response(answer to the ID request from another node) packet data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Encapsulate the given data into an addressing packet

        Parameters:
        sourceId - an ID of the sender
        acceptableId - a suggested ID for requester
        takenIds - a list of the already taken IDs

      • setAnswerPacketData

                                byte suggestedId,
                                byte[] timestamp,
                                byte[] alreadyTakenIds)
        Sets source ID, the suggested ID and the list of already taken IDs to the answer packet.
        Parameters:
        sourceId - ID address of the current node
        suggestedId - the issued ID to the new node
        alreadyTakenIds - the list of already taken IDs(excluding the suggested ID)
